description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐"如同一個化學家的思考方式"來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
description.en: Chemistry is fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping head to the equation or model that will follow.In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，.灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。
description.en: Fuzzy control and grey system are introduced in this course.  Then students can apply these theories to control systems and vehicle control.  Contents are fuzzy sets, inference, design of fuzzy controller, application, gray system, gray prediction, gray modeling, and gray control.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算(硬性計算)最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為:利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於1965年由Zadeh所提出的模糊集理論，1973年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems.  The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The inclusion of neural computing and genetic computing in soft computing came at a later point. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES).  Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimizat

name.en: Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)將包含下列主題:o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
description.en: This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating asymbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals ofmachine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the followingtopics:※ The physics of image formation,※ Vision System Design,※ Motion vision,※ Recovering shapes from shading,※ Shape from Shading,※ Binary image processing,※ Photogrammetry,※ Stereo Vision,※ Object representation alignment,※ Camera Calibration,※ Computational vision,※ Optical Illumination,※ Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interactionTextbook:Horn, Berthold K. P., Robot Vision. Cambridge, MA: MIT Press/McGraw-Hill,March 1986. ISBN: 0262081598.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討多輸入多輸出系統(MIMO)其系統行為之描述，內容包括MIMO系統之穩定性分析、觀察性分析及其控制器設計，並探討MIMO系統的物理觀念及其數學描述的各種方法，是線性系統之進階課程，適合碩士班以上之學生學習。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to explore the behaviors of multivariable systems. The contents includes: stability analysis, observability analysis, and controller designs for MIMO linear systems. Besides, we will introduce the physical concept of MMIO linear systems and various methods of describing MIMO linear systems via mathematical model. This is an advanced course to linear system theory, and is especially for graduate students.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS, Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCA Factor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering, Project

description.zh: 本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在介紹組合最佳化的概念、組合最佳化問題的解法、以及組合最佳化技術在製造業與服務業的應用。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts of combinatorial optimization, the solution algorithms for the combinatorial optimization problems, and its applications on manufacturing and services industries.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

notes: 四光二與四電資二合開

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

name.zh: 太陽光電池應用與展望
name.en: Technical progress and future prospect on solar photovoltaic

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生太陽能光電科技及能源相關產業及製程技術之實務知識。課程設計將著重基礎太陽能光電科技知識的建立,首先介紹太陽能光電科技所應具備之基本知識,並教授能源材料的基本特性及原理以及目前應用概況.藉由說明太陽能電池之設計原理與效率提高準則為出發點，教導學生了解太陽能光電科技所應用到之材料基本特性及相關製作程序。本課程將由本校專任教師配合企業講師和技術實務專業教師演講,透過實例之講解及工廠參觀，引導學生了解應用領域及製造產業。期盼培育學生迅速進入太陽能光電及能源材料相關產業工作能力與競爭力。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of solar energy technology. It intends to educate and train students with the fundamental theories and technical application of solar energy and solar- cell fabrication technology. The future prospect of photovoltaics will be revealed to help students understand strong demands in solar industries. The experienced industrial lectures will present the potential marketing, working principles of solar devices, and progress in commercialization of solar cells. Students will also be given the opportunities to on-site visit the solar-related industries.

notes: 四甲、乙及化工所合開(限35人)

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。1. 高分子物理及化學性質2. 高分子光電特性3. 功能性高分子4. 液晶高分子5. 薄膜技術與應用6. 生醫材料及高分子藥物7. 高分子導體及半導體8. 光電用高分子9. 高分子電池10. 高分子LED
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles and applications of polymers. It covers the following topics: physical and chemical properties; electrical and optical characterizations; functional polymers; liquid crystalline polymers; membranes; biomaterials; polymers for photonic and electronics; conductive and semi-conductive polymers; polymers for batteries; and polymeric LED.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

name.zh: 細胞生理反應之檢測原理與技術
name.en: Principles and Techniques to Test Cell physiology

description.zh: 本課程設計著重於實務操作與原理之探討，並藉由結果現象之觀察來使學生了解人體生理及醫學現象。主軸包括(1)檢視細胞之代謝與生長表現:細胞之生長好與壞可由其代謝途徑與生長速度判斷。本課程將把細胞培養在不同環境下，觀察並定量其代謝活性、生長速度及代謝產物。 (2)細胞形態之定性觀察:不同組織之內部細胞，其形態不一。本課程將介紹以不同物理/化學之方法來觀察細胞形態，使學生熟悉不同生理組織中細胞之形態之差異及其與其組織生理特性之關聯。學期中將邀請校外學者及業界人士演講此些技術在業界與學術界之應用及實務性。本課程之分類大綱如下:1.   細胞代謝與細胞活性+實驗 (測細胞活性)2.   探討細胞生長因素+實驗 (計算細胞數目)3.   蛋白質與DNA在細胞中的角色+實驗(定量DNA)4.  細胞之代謝中間與最終產物(RNA與蛋白質) +實驗(定量細胞產物與ELISA原理)5.    不同生理組織之特性+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(螢光染色))6. 細胞外觀與生理特性之關聯+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(切片染色))7.    生醫材料與細胞組織交互作用之實例探
description.en: This course focuses on hands-on training of basic cell laboratory skills. The purpose is to help students understand cell physiology. The main curriculum contains 1. measuring cell growth and metabolism; 2. observing cell morphology. There will also be speakers from the industry and academic institutes to talk about more specific applications.The class contains the following topics:1.	Cell metabolism and viability (Experiment: measure cell viability)2.	Cell growth (Experiment: Cell counting)3.	Proteins and DNA (Experiment: DNA quantification)4.	Cell intermediate and final products (Experiment: quantification of cellular products and ELISA)5.	Tissue physiology (Experiment: fluorescent stain of cells)6.	Cell morphology (Experiment: histological stain of cells)Cellular interactions with biomedical materials.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

name.zh: 太陽光電池應用與展望
name.en: Technical progress and future prospect on solar photovoltaic

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生太陽能光電科技及能源相關產業及製程技術之實務知識。課程設計將著重基礎太陽能光電科技知識的建立,首先介紹太陽能光電科技所應具備之基本知識,並教授能源材料的基本特性及原理以及目前應用概況.藉由說明太陽能電池之設計原理與效率提高準則為出發點，教導學生了解太陽能光電科技所應用到之材料基本特性及相關製作程序。本課程將由本校專任教師配合企業講師和技術實務專業教師演講,透過實例之講解及工廠參觀，引導學生了解應用領域及製造產業。期盼培育學生迅速進入太陽能光電及能源材料相關產業工作能力與競爭力。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of solar energy technology. It intends to educate and train students with the fundamental theories and technical application of solar energy and solar- cell fabrication technology. The future prospect of photovoltaics will be revealed to help students understand strong demands in solar industries. The experienced industrial lectures will present the potential marketing, working principles of solar devices, and progress in commercialization of solar cells. Students will also be given the opportunities to on-site visit the solar-related industries.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。將進一步介紹組織工程之要素與生醫材料扮演之角色。包括材料與生物分子間的表面性質及特性。接著以細胞為主題，介紹如幹細胞生物學、細胞移動、組織環境、及組織功能基質細胞之研究等。最後介紹特殊器官與工程學上之關係，與極可能在臨床的發展與應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties. The interactions between cells, biomaterials, and related applications will be illustrated in order to give an overview of tissue engineering.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限碩二及博士班二年級以上者

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: (1)基本理論(2)光學薄膜設計之圖示法(3)分光鏡(4)高反射鏡(5) 截止濾光片(6)帶通濾光片(7)斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

name.en: Theory and Applications of Optical Fibers

description.zh: 光纖是光纖通信及光電應用中非常重要的元件。在本課程裡，我們將先介紹光的基本概念、然後是光纖材料與製成技術、光纖結構與傳播原理、傳播特性與分析、非線性特性、和有關的系統與應用。其中所討論的標題包含：(1)電磁波傳播之回顧(2)平板波導(3)單階折射率光纖(4)光纖的特性與分析(5)漸階折射率光纖(6)光纖於光纖通信之應用(7)光纖感測器之介紹(8)光纖光柵之介紹
description.en: This course provides the basics of light propagation in fibers; these include fundamental waveguiding concepts, the influence of various fiber structures, material properties of light transmission, and related devices and systems. The following topics will be introduced:(1) Review of electromagnetic wave propagation, (2) Slab waveguides, (3) Optical fibers with single-step index profiles, (4) Loss and dispersion in optical fiber, (5) Nonlinear effects in fiber (I), (6) Nonlinear effects in fiber (II), (7) Introduction to fiber sensors, (8) Introduction to fiber gratings.

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2.	explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

description.zh: 應用光學：使學生了解”光機電整合”系統中光學部份的基本原理光系統元件特性與應用、內容包括；幾何光學，雷射光束傳播，干涉繞射理論，偏極光特性，電光效應，聲光效應，光纖的導波特性，光纖在感測上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to provide student of fundamental concepts, techniques and applications of otics in a Opto-Electronic integrated system.It may include the theories of geometric options, the propagation of laser beam,the difraction and interference of light,the characteristis of coherence and polarization, the effents of the Electro-Optic, Magneto-optic modulation,the optical properties of waveguide and optic-fibre,and the applications of optical fibre sensor.

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，短通道效應，表通道技術原理，費米能階等基本元件物理，及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 1. FPD背景簡介 2.FPD製程原理 3. 偏極化: Jones 矩陣 4. 液晶顯示器的Jones矩陣模型 5.主動式液晶顯示面板設計初步
description.en: 1.Background Introduction to FPD2.Process Technology for FPD3.Polarization: Jones Matrix4.Jones Matrix Model of LCD5.AM-LCD Panel Design: Preliminary

description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 基礎知識與定義、大氣汙染、空氣汙染物、水文循環、水質處理、水汙染、固體廢棄物、大地汙染、噪音汙染、工業廢氣處理。
description.en: Basics and definitions, atmospheric and land pollutions, air pollurants, hydrology, water pollution and treatment, solid waste, noise pollution, industrial exhaust air treatment.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 此課程之目的為介紹一整體的鑽井與井完成作業，內容包括：油氣地質及岩石特性、油氣探勘方法、鑽機設備、鑽井技術、岩心取樣與分析、井測、岩層破碎、井壁處理及井完成作業。
description.en: English Description  Properties and occurrence of petroleum; petroleum exploration, equipment, materials, and processes employed in drilling and production practices; well completions; oil field operation.

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理                                         廠之規劃.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh: 本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。      二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。      三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。      四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。      五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的規劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告製作可如何掌握、發揮互動式媒體的特性，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程亦教導同學如何應用電腦影像（computer imaging）與多媒體的科技與技術，來製作互動式廣告。
description.en: This course is mainly about the planning and principles of interactive advertisement production such as features of interactive media, how can advertisement production control and develop the features of interactive media, as well as the related concepts, technology, and skills needed in order to build, design, develop, and maintain interactive advertisement. Students will learn how to use computer imaging and the technology and techniques of multi-media to make an interactive advertisement.

description.zh: 虛擬實境是一種藝術與科技的整合，廣泛運用在不同屬性的領域，如飛行模擬器、醫療檢測設備、成品預覽等。本虛擬實境應用之課程內容，將專注於虛擬實境應用對於未來科技、生活等不同層面的影響，同時探討沈浸、想像、互動與人類心理認知的相互關係。課程內容包含幾何式虛擬實境、影像式虛擬實境、混合式虛擬實境等。
description.en: Virtual reality (VR) is an integration of art and technology. It is widely used in fields that are very different in nature such as aviation simulator, medical inspection equipment, preview of finished products, etc. This course will focus on the impact of VR application in the future technology and lifestyles as well as explore the relationships among engrossment, imagination, interaction, and human psychological cognition. The course content includes graphic-based VR, imaged-based VR, and hybrid VR.

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹運用機電科技與互動設計之整合應用，特別針對互動裝置及互動系統中所需之輸入裝置、輸出裝置、控制裝置及機構裝置之設計。其中輸入裝置包括感測器, 攝影裝置等，輸出裝置包括馬達、驅動器、致動器、LED顯示裝置等，控制裝置包括各型控制器，如Arduino, Basic Stamp等，機構裝置包括可動件與介互動操作模式以及搭配不同材料所產生之互動效果。本課程透過學生分組構思出不同的機電與設計之整合創意，並實作出互動裝置，特別著重在跳脫原本機電科技的用途，進而賦予新的應用的可能性。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the application of mechatronic technology and interactive design, especially the design of input and output, control, and mechanical devices the interactive system needs. Input device contains image sensor and camera, while output device include motor, driver, actuator, and LED display. Control device include various controllers such as Arduino and Basic Stamp. Mechanical device include portable and interactive mode and the interactions resulted from different materials. Students will be asked to come up with different mechatronics designs and create a real interactive device to differentiate from the conventional usage of mechtronic technology which would create a new possibility.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹互動設計於產品設計上之應用。修習此課程之學生可學習互動產品設計之基礎概念與方法，並熟悉互動技術於產品設計上之應用，藉由互動情境模擬，實際進行產品造型與使用者介面設計的實作的演練，達到可進行互動產品概念發展與設計實務之能力。課程內容包含互動產品開發與設計程序、使用者需求、互動情境模擬、軟體與硬體介面設計、使用者介面設計、圖像化介面設計、輸入與輸出裝置應用以及控制與顯示裝置等。教學方式將以課堂講授以及學生作業實作與發表為主，並以作品、報告以及課堂發表為評分依據。
description.en: This course is focused on the introduction and application of interactive product design. Students can understand basic knowledge and methods for interactive product design, and are familiar with the application of interactive technologies on product design, through interactive scenario simulation, user interface and product form practicing to be equipped with the ability of developing conceptual interactive product design practice. The contents include interactive product design development process, user requirements, interactive scenario, hard/soft interface design, user interface design, GUI design, input/output device and control/display. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, practical work and presentation, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and design work.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討的議題包括資訊系統需求規格的制定方法，資訊系統的建置平台，所使用技術與語言的趨勢，和其效果、效率及維護成本的評估。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: The topics of this course include the documentation methods of requirement and specification for information system, the economical development workplace, the trend of new developing techniques and language, and the evaluations of maintenance and developing effect. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in information system development.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

description.zh: 培養學生具有對於現今專利法規、申請審查、專利說明書及其撰寫的相關認識，將專利權的概念植入研發精神中，進而運用於其研究計畫之先前規劃及研究方向之擬定上，縮短學術研究與產業應用的落差，並以專利權來保護研發成果。課程內容：如何分析一份專利文件，親自撰寫一份好的專利說明書，如何作專利組合規劃，瞭解專利申請的每一程序。
description.en: Want to protect the achievement of researching and developing with the patent right, the most important condition is to write a suitable patent specification. This course aims at letting students understand: How to analyze a patent document; How to write a good patent specification; How to make the patent portfolio planning; Understand each procedure of application for patent.

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理簡介、快速原型系統簡介、Solid Model建立、3D實體建構、快速模具簡介、快速原型技術應用簡介。
description.en: Introduction to principle of rapid prototyping, Introduction to System of rapid prototyping, Building of Solid model, Building of 3D parts, Introduction to rapidtooling, Introduction to applications of rapid prototyping technology.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

description.zh: 奈微米工程於生物醫學之應用日趨重要，量測與操作工具的開發與實際的生醫應用對象的大小尺寸具有密切的相關性，對於生物系統的充份瞭解是工程表現的重要過程之一。在此課程中將配合本校實驗室目前之相關研究設備進行原理講解與應用討論，包括之項目將由分子、細胞到組織之感測、分析與操縱。選修學生須依下列重點：奈微米生醫感測系統、奈米生醫材料、奈米生醫光電以及實驗室晶片等領域選擇期中期末報告之題目與計畫內容，主要要求在尋求創新思考方向，以求在原理或應用上的突破，積極推動跨領域與技術先進之整合性研究。
description.en: Nano/micro engineering in bio-medicine applications has become increasingly important. The development and operation of measurement tool for biomedical applications has a close correlation to the actual size of the object. In this course we will explain the principles of devices and discuss the applications based on the school's research laboratories, including sensing, analysis and manipulation of molecules, cells, and tissues. Students will be required to do a project about Nano-micron biomedical sensor systems, nano-biomaterials and nano-biomedical areas such as optical and lab-chip. The interim and final report should devote to the topic and plans in the search for the direction of Creative Thinking with a view to the breakthrough of theory or application, and actively promote the integration of advanced interdisciplinary research and technology.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.en: Principles and applications of bio-chemical sensors

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。簡介，生化感測器分類，生化感測材料，生化與觸媒反應機制，生物感測器之設計與製造，化學感測器之設計與製造，介面與校正方法，氣體感測器專題，微型與智慧型感測器，實驗室晶片概念，應用與未來展望。
description.en: Introduction, Classification of bio-chemical sensors, Materials for bio-chemical sensing, General study on bio-chemical reaction and catalytic mechanism, Design and manufacture of biosensors, Design and manufacture of chemical sensors, Interface and calibration methods, A special topic on gas sensors, Micro and smart sensors, Lab-on chip, Applications and future outlook.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: C、QBASIC、FORTRAN或LISP，區段架構（變數、輸入／輸出），迴圈（ for,while,do,while ），選擇敘述（ if-else敘述，switch敘述），函數（函數的資料傳遞，外部變數），陣列與字串（陣列中元素之表達，字串），指標（指標與陣列，雙重指標：指向指標的指標），結構、等位以及 ROMBIOS，檔案（標準I/O，記錄I/O，隨機存取），如何設計一個大程式（分開編譯，記憶體式）。
description.en: Computer Languages: C, QBASIC, FORTRAN or LISP (Compiler or Interpreter) Including such as Statements of Flow Control: (Sequence, Selectionand Iteration), Basic Data Type and Input/Ouput Statement Subprograms(Parameters Called by Value and Address), Array, String and pointerStruct, Enum, Union and File How to Design a Large Program (Project,Memory Mode, Library).

description.zh: 本課程主要是針對研究所學生所開設，課程目標為介紹學生電力電子學的基本電路及分析切換式電源的操作原理。課程章節內容包含了電力電子系統介紹，二極體整流器，直流至直流切換式轉換器，切換式直流至交流變流器，零電壓及零電流切換，切換式直流電源供應器，電力調節器與不斷電系統，馬達驅動器介紹，家庭及工業之應用及 公用電力之應用。
description.en: This course is mainly designed for graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce fundamental circuits of power electronics and analyze operation principles of switching mode power. This course includes Introduce to power electronic system, Diode Rectifiers, DC-DC Switch-Mode Converters, Switch-Mode DC-AC Inverters, Zero-Voltage or Zero-Current Switchings, Switching DC Power Supplies, Power Conditioners and Uninterruptible Power Supplies, Introduction to Motor Drives, Residential and Industrial Applications and Electric Utility Applications.

description.zh: 老人醫學基礎、 老人藥物學概論、 老人預防醫學概論、 老人醫療倫理與醫療效益概論、 老人永續照護概論 、老人感染與傳染病防治概論、老人精神照護概論、老人一般醫學概論、 老人急重症醫學概論、 老人醫療與生活科技技術概論
description.en: 1. General principle of aging  2. Geriatric pharmacy  3. Preventive geriatrics  4. Ethics and medical effects in geriatrics  5. Perpetual geriatric care  6. Infections management and prevention in elderly  7. Psychogeriatric care  8. General geriatrics 9. Geriatric emergency medical care 10. LOHAS (Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability) technology,

description.zh: 介紹計算機演算法的設計與分析,內容包含了: 函數成長, 遞迴關係, 排序及序列統計, 基礎與進階資料結構, 動態規劃, 貪婪演算法, 搜尋, 圖形與幾何演算法, 字串比對, NP-completeness, 近似演算法, 及平行與分散式演算法.
description.en: This course gives a broad introduction about the design and analysis of computer algorithms. General topics to be covered include: growth of functions, recurrences, sorting and order statistics, fundamental and advanced data structures, dynamic programming, greedy algorithms, searching, graph and geometry algorithms, string matching, NP-completeness, approximation algorithms, parallel and distributed algorithms.

description.zh: 本課程分兩大部份，第一部份以直流電路為主，內容包含(1).電學之基本觀念和定義;(2).應用歐姆定理及克希荷夫定律來求解串聯、並聯、串並聯和一些通用的電阻電路;(3).以分壓、分流定理及網路定理(網目電流法、節點電壓法、重疊定理、戴維寧定理、諾頓定理、密爾門定理)來求解和分析電路;(4).Y型和Delta型電路的互換;(5).RC及RL暫態電路的分析。第二部份以交流電路為主，內容包含(1).交流電之基本觀念與物理意義;(2).交流電之相量表示法;(3).交流穩態分析;(4).交流網路理論;(5).交流穩態功率之求解;(6).變壓器;(7).濾波器。
description.en: The course covers fundamentals of DC and AC circuits, methods of analysis, capacitance, magnetism, simple transients and other topics that are usually taught in an introductory circuit analysis course.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 現代空間設計與產品設計除產品方案之創意議題外，影響產品價值最鉅者莫過於專利權之保護。本課程之目的即在於動手實作開發設計產品時，在規劃設計上先期注入專利概念，並探討其申請作業程序內容，以培養學生專利產品開發設計能力。
description.en: Besides the creativity of a building- or industrial- product, the most important issue which affects its value would be the patent. In this workshop a practical product developing with the concept of patent in the design process would be carried out from the very beginning of the drawing up.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則,工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康,安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

notes: 博雅選修課程-哲學向度(博雅選修(二))

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.zh: 電腦輔助能源與熱流科學分析
name.en: Computer-Aided Analysis on Energy ad Thermofluid Sciences

description.zh: 本課程適合修過工程數學及基礎熱流的碩博士班學生選修。授課內容主要是應用Matlab及CFD套裝軟體分析能源與熱流科學領域的相關問題，並著重於案例分析。課程內容主要包括利用數值分析解析邊界層問題、有限差分法求解穩態與暫態熱傳導以及二維強制驅動流問題，案例分析包括室內氣流運動、潔淨室氣流分佈、熱交換器性能分析、儲冰系統分析、電子散熱以及氫能系統等。
description.en: This course is suitable for the graduate students who have taken fundamental courses of engineering mathematics and thermofluid sciences. The objective of this course is to apply Matlab and CFD packages to analyze the problems related to energy and thermofluid sciences. Case study is the focus of this course. Course contents mainly include the application of numerical methods on solving boundary-layer problems, analyzing steady and transient heat conduction problems, and 2-D lid-driven flow problems by finite difference method. Case study covers room air flow motion, clean room simulation, heat exchanger performance, electronic cooling, thermal ice storage system and hydrogen energy, etc.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

name.en: Solar Electrical Energy Technology and Application

description.zh: 太陽能是再生能源之一，太陽能又分為熱能技術轉換和電能技術轉換兩大領域。本課程介紹太陽電能技術轉換系統，包含太陽光電發電系統概論、模組及陣列、支架結構、變流器、蓄電池、直流配電、交流配電、相關儀器、網路併聯、組裝、測試、相關法令規章及實例參觀…等，使學習者有一完整太陽電能技術與應用的觀念。
description.en: Solar energy is one of renewable energy， the Solar energy has divided two field as Heating-transformation and Photovoltaic-transformation。The aim of this course to discuss include photovoltaic-introduction、module and array、structure、converter、battery、DC/AC distributed、instrument、grid-connected system、construction、commissioning、relevant-decree and visiting …etc.。Let students have a complete concept of solar electrical energy technology and application。

description.zh: 本課程首先將建立學生對原子模型的觀念，進而學習相關核反應、中子物理及核反應器物理之相關基本知識。內容包括：物質基本概念、原子模型發展、物質與波、電子軌域、化學鍵、量子數、鮑立不相容原理、氫原子模型、質能不滅、守恆定律、原子與核、核反應、放射線與衰變、放射性與物質作用等。
description.en: The purpose of this lecture will firstly help the students to establish the concept of atomic model. It will further provide students to lean the fundamental knowledge in nuclear reactions, neutron physics, and nuclear reactor physics. Basic material and concept to be covered are: atomic model evolution, matter and wave, electronic orbits, chemical bond, quantum number, Pauli exclusion principle, hydrogen model, conservation law, atom and nucleus, nuclear reaction, radiation and decay, interaction between radiation and matter,…etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 傳統電廠與核電廠比較、核電廠發電原理、NSSS、BOP、壓力槽與內部組件、核燃料與控制棒、核電廠控制系統、熱傳與冷卻系統、屏蔽與多重防禦、圍阻體、餘熱移除之系統、中子偵檢、第四代反應器、其他安全系統、等。
description.en: The course contents include: basis of nuclear power plant, NSSS, BOP, reactor pressure vessel and internal components, nuclear fuel and control rod assembly, reactor control, heat transfer and coolant system, shielding and multilayer containments, residual heat removal system, neutron detection system, other safety related system, Gen-IV reactors, … etc.

notes: 洪祖全老師/劉明哲老師(限60人)

description.zh: 修習內容包含：核能科技演進對人類的啟發、核能與輻射、輻射線與物質之互應作用、核能基本理論、核能應用與核能發電原理、以及核反應器原理。
description.en: The contents of this course consists of: the evolution of the nuclear technology, nuclear energy and radiations, interactions of radiation with matters, basic nuclear theory, nuclear applications and the basic working mechanisms of the nuclear power generation, and nuclear reactor theory.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制、數值控制、幾何資料處理、進給驅動器、NC機器的位置量測系統、自動化加工的機器監視與診斷、電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。在台灣，擁有十個以上員工的公司有86%有自屬的企業網站，而擁有自屬網站的頁有近七成聘僱網頁設計師進駐公司任職，面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1. Graphic standards for working drawing. 2. Drawing preparation and process. 3. Selected shop drawing

name.en: The technique and application of power electronics

description.zh: 本課程的目的為訓練學生獲得在電力電子裝置與系統的原理及應用技術。課程教材主要內容包括功率二極體特性、矽控整流器、AC-DC轉換器、AC電壓控制器、DC-DC轉換器、DC-AC轉換器、AC-AC 轉換器及交流馬達驅動電路系統等章節。期使學生在未來能夠應用於各種不同的電力電子裝置與系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the principles and application technique of power electronics devices and systems. The course outline mainly includes power diode characteristics, silicon-controlled rectifier, AC-DC converter, DC-DC converter, DC-AC converter, AC-AC converter and AC motor drive system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to implement the plan and design of many types of power electronics device and system in the future.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.en: This course is an introduction to the historical study and academic writing on architecture. It aims at the establishment of a analytical vision and the ability in academic writing in doing research of architectural history. Three parts are concluded:  1. Defining the meaning of 'History'.  2. Exploring the theories of historical studies and            research methodologies.  3. Analyzing the structure of remarkable articles on      'architecture history'.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 在網路商店上出售商品時，總是希望能剌激消費者的購買慾、或是能吸引客源增加銷售量。在這樣一個情況下，能夠給網路買家留下一個好印象且能左右商品購買率的，便是商品照片的好壞。本課程中我們將教你網拍商品攝影的技巧，實拍經驗的養成及商業攝影的商品、空間與質感的表現方法。以網路商品用的「靜物攝影」為重點，嚴選60項最常見的網路販賣商品，透過整合基礎攝影的know-how，教導如何一個人利用數位相機，以最簡潔、便利而又能拍出高品質照片為目的的商品攝影，是網路創業的必要能力。課程內容包含：商業攝影器材使用、攝影棚光源運用(攝影棚)、廣告商品實拍(攝影棚)、學員作品的討論及檢討。
description.en: When you sell something in the internet, take a good picture is very important. This course will teach you how to take a good picture.

notes: 計中教室,修課人數限55人(四工三甲乙、最後一哩)

name.zh: 創新思維執行力實務應用
name.en: Practices and applications of TRIZ innovative thinking

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新"以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM或OEM製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下:完整詳實闡述TRIZ理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明TRIZ概念、工程TRIZ實務案例10餘個與TRIZ工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約800餘個，管理實務案例20餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。本課程TRIZ研發、工程與管理兼顧，製造業與服務業高層、中層與基層員工皆符合讀者條件，使"突破創新"輕易實務執行並成為企業文化，亦適用於大學與研究所之工管、企管(經營管理)、工商管與工程相關科系，可自行按需求選擇性深入教授講解某些章節，也替產業界事先磨練一群創新思維之活力新血，可長久伴隨您在職場(或未來進入職場)解決研發、工程與管理之困難矛盾問題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

name.zh: 顧客關係管理與商業智慧
name.en: Customer Relationship Management and Business Intelligence

description.zh: 顧客關係管理主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利，其內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI於顧客關係管理之應用。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: The objectives of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) are to study the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes concepts and context of CRM, consumer behavior, customer data mining, CRM system, planning and management of CRM projects, performance measurement of CRM. Business intelligence (BI) systems refer to applications and technologies which gather and analyze data about company operations. It then provides a comprehensive correlation of those factors, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and helps managers to make better business decisions. This course focuses on applications of BI in CRM, with the introduction of shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques such as RFID, along with database and data warehouse concepts. Hands-on experience in BI software implementation is also emphasized.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在瞭解專案投資的擬定、決策分析、執行與評估方法。其內容包括：投資環境、專案投資評估法、利率與通膨率、折舊、專案現金流量分析、資金預算分配、投資風險評估、影響專案投資之經濟、管理、環境與政治因素，並探討不同因素對專案投資之影響，期提供良好的專案投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment projects, investment decision-making, project execution and analysis methods. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, capital budgeting, uncertainty and risk, investment projects and its relationships with economics, management, environment, and politics. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 針對大學所習之廣義生產管理再作深入的闡述，一方面做公開的個案分析研討，以收進一步的學習之效，同時要求學生做實務專題研究
description.en: Production and operation management,case study and analysis,and independent study.

notes: 管理國際專班為必修；工管所為選修(440教室)

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Forum on Service and Technology Management

description.zh: 本課程主要邀請學術界或企業界的學者專家，從理論或實務的角度，經由演講介紹近代的服務與科技管理專題，促使學生更深入及廣面瞭解管理現狀或趨勢。
description.en: This seminar course invites guest speakers from well known companies to share their experiences of service and technology management and provide students the updated practices and management trends in the field.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

notes: A班(請選博雅核心--文學(一))

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

notes: B班(請選博雅核心--文學(三))

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 學習"邏輯推理"主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。
description.en: The main purpose of studying "Logical Inference" is to help us obtain a kind of logical ability, by means of which we will be able to make right choices for our life.  This courses covers at least the following topics: basic ideas in logic, the truth table method, 18 basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in sentential logic, basic axiomatic systems in sentential logic, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, interpretations in quantificational logic, basic axiomatic systems in quantificational logic, meta-theorem in sentential logic, meta-theorem in quantificational logic, traditional syllogism, the fallacy theory, and the translation between natural and formal language, etc.

description.zh: 現代科技文明進展得非常迅速，這使得一般人日常生活中，可能經常享受到這些科技所帶來的便利，但卻習以為常，以為天生下來就是這樣的，這些現代的科技，可能是關於電機的、物理的、化工的、光電的、材料的......，更有可能同時涉及了其他許多個領域，更可能有許多人希望能夠了解這些科技的來龍去脈，一窺其究竟，人類在沒有土木工程學之前，早已能建築萬里長城和金字塔，許許多多的科技是由嘗試錯誤，經驗的累積逐漸得來的，當然，隨著知識的不斷窮究其理，"知而後行"的高科技也就會越來越多，我們在這裡也試圖去追蹤各項科技的演進史與現況方面讓大家知道羅馬不是一天所造成的，另一方面也讓大家有從另一個角度重新思考的機會，也許這些科技進化到現在，還稱不上成熟的階段，您也許可以找出另一種更好的方法來改進它們！
description.en: Modern technology is growing fast. People thus enjoy the convenience in company with the technology—which they do and they just take it for granted to do. It may have something to do with electrical engineering, physics, chemical engineering, electro-optical engineering, materials…Some problems involves more than one field. People are curious about the technology and willing to know how to solve the problems. Human beings are able to build the pyramids and the Long Walls before they know anything about civil engineering—knowledge actually piled up by trial and error or accumulated experience. As knowledge expands, hi-end technology which requires “know-how” becomes more popular. In this course, we try to trace the history and the current situations: “Rome was not built in a day.” On the other hand, we might take another chance to RE-think a deeper problem: technology evolves without getting to maturity. Human beings will be enforced to find some other ways to improve it.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 經濟學重視邏輯與嚴謹推理的理性特質是其主要特色，此亦為理工科系人之專長優勢，然而僅偏重左腦訓練的人才往往讓人覺得生冷機械，對事物看法也常過於直接而缺乏人情，若能在不失理性效率之下，兼顧以人為本之社會人文感性關懷，則經濟學自無愧為社會科學之母，其訓練目標亦與通識教育的人格均衡發展目的一致！為避免陷入一般經濟教學因理論工具比重過高而失焦，導致學生學習興趣驟減以致成效不彰，本課程重點在於先讓學生擁有強烈之學習動機，接著認知到"確立學習目的"的重要性，藉由生活實例直接帶領學生面對並感受問題，從而引導出經濟學切入問題的思維方式，並傳授其正確可行的學習態度與方法，同時提醒學生維持對專業知識批判的精神，在嚴謹訓練架構下督促其尋求感性的意涵，因而不致陷入經濟工具與名詞的浩瀚泥沼中，從而漸進體會出經濟學之精髓。
description.en: The science of economics is characterized by logics and cautious reasoning-at which most of the students of natural science and technology are good at. It is also a fact that those who take better advantage of the right brain are very likely to be straightforward and thus seemingly more mechanical and unsympathetic. Economics can be seen as the mother of science under the condition that rational efficiency-as well as the socially humanity--are kept at the same time. As a matter of act, the economic trainings share the same goal as what is required by the General Education courses.The first priority of the course is to highly motivate the students in the economic issues. We do our best to avoid too much weight generally put into teaching economics, leading to poor learning and teaching experience. Cases are studied in such a way that students will recognize the "real purpose of studying."  Real cases and examples are brought into discussion. We guide the students to"feel"the problems.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 多元文化不僅是當今世界的主流人文思維，也代表一種普世價值觀，更是全球人類彼此互動往來--地球村的基調。這門課主要是引導學生探討文化的意義，以及文化史的內涵，希望在有限的時間內，重點式的的介紹世界各主要國家的文化特色，經由對異文化的認識與比較，能夠協助學生建立較寬闊而多元的文化認知及價值取向。
description.en: Multi-culture is emerging as the mainstream field of humanities, involving not only a representation of universalism but also an interwoven tapestry of cross-cultural communication, which forms the fundamental structure of a global village. This course is to inspire students to search for the meaning of distinct cultures as well as the essence of cultural.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到17世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

notes: A班(請選博雅核心--歷史(一))

description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.
